translation.en: [girl 1] This is my last chance to be normal.
translation.zh: 这是我最后一次做正常人的机会

translation.en: The world don't know that yet.
translation.zh: 这个世界还不知道这点

translation.en: [girl 2] I don't want to share you with the world.
translation.zh: 我不想跟这个世界分享你

translation.en: Oh, y'all in here kissing again, huh?
translation.zh: 噢 你俩又躲在这里接吻啦 嗯？

translation.en: [girl 1] I told you to stop climbing through my window,
translation.zh: 我叫你不要再从我窗口爬进来了

translation.en: 'cause if Mommy catch you, I'mma get a beating.
translation.zh: 因为要是你被妈妈逮到了 挨打的肯定是我

translation.en: You're the only one she ain't gonna beat. Mommy slapped the shit out of me last week.
translation.zh: -你是她唯一不会打的人 -她上周才刚扇过我巴掌呢

translation.en: It's 'cause you told her to go to hell. You deserved it.
translation.zh: 那是因为你叫她下地狱 还能说你活该

translation.en: [girl 2] She tells your father to go to hell all the time.
translation.zh: 她自己还整天叫你爸下地狱呢

translation.en: She's grown. She can do that.
translation.zh: 她是成年人 她可以那么做的

translation.en: As long as we live in this house, we children.
translation.zh: 只要我们还住在这个家里 就还是孩子

translation.en: And children must honor… [both] …thy mother and thy father.
It's in the Bible. You gotta do it.
translation.zh: 圣经里说的 你必须这么做

translation.en: If we did everything the Bible say, we'd live in a pretty messed-up world.
translation.zh: 假如圣经上说什么我们就做什么 那我们生活的世界肯定一团糟

translation.en: Why you always want what I got?
translation.zh: 你干嘛总想要我的东西啊？

translation.en: [girl 2] I don't know why, you don't do shit.
translation.zh: 我不知道你有啥好紧张的 你啥正事都不干

translation.en: She ain't never had a hard day's work in her life.
translation.zh: 她这辈子就从没干过一天辛苦活儿

translation.en: Mommy makes me practice for six hours a day,
translation.zh: 妈妈逼我每天练习六个小时

translation.en: and she yells at me the whole time.
Both of y'all can shut the fuck up.

translation.zh: 此时此刻 我不知道

translation.en: Get your asses down here right now! Your father's home!
translation.zh: 快给我滚下来！你们爸爸回家了！
小茉 你也一起来呀

translation.en: -She ain't call my name. -[Abel] Don't worry. I'll protect you.
translation.zh: -她刚才可没叫我名字 -别担心 我会保护你的

translation.en: and when she starts giving me the evil eye, you don't do shit.
translation.zh: 但每次她恶狠狠盯着我看时 你却啥也不做

translation.en: Don't be messin' up my bag, boy.
translation.zh: 别把我的包搞坏了 小子

translation.en: What was y'all doing up there?
translation.zh: 你们几个在上头做什么？

translation.en: Go in there and say hello to your daddy.
translation.zh: 快进去跟你们爸爸打招呼
身上一股大麻味啊 你小子

translation.en: Why you let him smoke that cigar in the house?
translation.zh: 你为什么让他在房子里抽雪茄啊？

translation.en: Look, I don't care if you do it. Just don't bring it around your sister.
translation.zh: 你怎么搞我不在乎 只要别在你姐姐面前抽就行

translation.en: [Father] You singing in church or something?

translation.zh: 最近怎么样？跟我说说吧

translation.en: I was just trying to help.

translation.zh: 我给你带了个东西回来

translation.en: Look at that. Do you like it? -It's beautiful. -Mmm.
translation.zh: -你瞧瞧 喜欢吗？ -好漂亮啊

translation.en: Take it out. Let me put it on you. You just pull that.
translation.zh: 拿出来 我帮你戴上 这样拉出来
嗯 好了 等一下
这个啊 你要一直戴着

translation.en: in honor of God's love for you.
Turn around. Let me put this on you.
translation.zh: 转过身去 我帮你戴上

translation.en: This will affirm your faith, keep you safe,
translation.zh: 这将申明你的信仰 保障你的安全

translation.en: [echoing] …that God loves you as His own.
Always wear this. It'll protect you, keep you safe.
translation.zh: 要一直戴着 它会保护你 保障你的安全

translation.en: Always wear this. Always… It'll protect you. [echoes overlapping]
translation.zh: 要一直戴着 它会保护你 它会提醒你…理解…

translation.en: How come you didn't bring me nothing?
translation.zh: 你怎么啥也没给我带啊？

translation.en: -[Beauty] I thought you liked-- -Get them bags upstairs, boy.
translation.zh: -我还以为你喜欢… -快把袋子拿上楼去 小子

translation.en: [Abel] You lucky Beauty was here. I was about to drop your ass.
translation.zh: 算你走运美丽在 不然我早就揍扁你了

translation.en: Nigga, you wasn't about to do shit. Beauty just saved your life.
translation.zh: 大哥 你揍个屁啊 美丽这是救了你一命

translation.en: I'm sick of his ass always trying to punk me. He just mad 'cause he ain't cute like y'all.
translation.zh: -我受够了这傻逼老想着取笑我 -他不像你俩那么好看心里不平衡

translation.en: Ain't my fault he got a ugly daddy.
translation.zh: 他爹长得丑又不是我的错

translation.en: [Mother] Do not say that about your brother.
You're never going to convince me
translation.zh: 你是永远也不可能说服我

translation.en: that in order to live, I gotta eat something dead.
translation.zh: 为了活下去 我必须得要那玩意

translation.en: You ain't gonna convince me. It's not gonna happen.
translation.zh: 你是说服不了我的 不可能的

translation.en: [inhales] I heard you shut the place down last night.
translation.zh: 我听说你昨晚是震惊四座啊

translation.en: Wanted to see if you got what it takes.
translation.zh: 想看看你有没有这个本事

translation.en: I guess I do. I could've told you that.
translation.zh: -看来我有 -这我一早就知道了

translation.en: Still can't hold a candle to me, though.
translation.zh: 还是没办法跟我相提并论
我知道是这样的 妈妈

translation.en: Nobody can hold a candle to you.
If the student is not as good as the teacher,
translation.zh: 要是学生没有老师那么优秀

translation.en: then the teacher's not doing a good job.
[Father] Well, you have done a wonderful job teaching her, honey.
translation.zh: 嗯 你把她教得非常好 亲爱的

translation.en: She still got some work to do.
translation.zh: 她还有需要提高的地方

translation.en: I think she ready for the big time.
translation.zh: 我觉得她准备好登上大舞台了

translation.en: Don't speak at my table unless I ask you a question.
translation.zh: 坐在我的餐桌上 除非我问你问题 不然别说话

translation.en: -I don't need permission to speak. -When you're in my house, you do.
translation.zh: -我说话不需要经过许可 -当你在我家里时就需要

translation.en: -Then I'll leave. -Yeah! Get the fuck out!
translation.zh: -那我走就是了 -好啊！ 给我滚出去！美丽 让她走

translation.en: Beauty, let her go. Don't need this devil worshipper in my home.
translation.zh: 给我滚出去！美丽 让她走 不需要这个崇拜魔鬼的人

translation.en: -I don't worship no devil. -You don't worship God.
translation.zh: -我才不崇拜魔鬼呢！ -你不崇拜上帝

translation.en: Can we all just calm down?
[Father] We are having a family discussion,
translation.zh: 我们这是在讨论家事 而据我所知

translation.en: and last time I checked, you aren't part of this family.
translation.zh: 我们这是在讨论家事 而据我所知 你不是这个家里的一员

translation.en: -Maybe one day I will be. -[Father] What you gonna do?
translation.zh: -或许有一天我会是的 -你要怎么做？

translation.en: I wouldn't touch that thing with a ten-foot pole.
translation.zh: 这种货色我躲都来不及呢
-该隐 住口 -快走吧 小茉

translation.en: Let's run away and get married and never come back.
translation.zh: 跑出去 结个婚 再也不要回来了

translation.en: You think marriage is a joke? Huh?
translation.zh: 你们觉得婚姻是个玩笑吗？嗯？

translation.en: "For this reason, a man leaves his mother and father
translation.zh: “为这缘故 人将离开父母

translation.en: and unites with his wife to become one."
translation.zh: 与妻子结合 两个人就成为一体
这样 夫妻不再是两个人 而是一体了

translation.en: That you're one flesh with your wife?
That you only have eyes for her?
Cain, would you take my plate, please, son?
translation.zh: 该隐 帮我收走盘子好吗 儿子？

translation.en: [woman] Oh, well, your husband asked me to come by around six.
translation.zh: 哦 是你丈夫叫我6点左右来的

translation.en: -Why you leave her on the doorstep? -I don't want her up in my damn house.
translation.zh: -你干嘛不让她进来啊？ -因为我不想让她进我的家

translation.en: [Mother] I don't need to hear her out to know she full of shit.
translation.zh: 我不需要听她开口说话 就知道她肯定满嘴的谎言

translation.en: Then I'mma talk to her myself.
You can't make a decision like that without me!
translation.zh: 做这种决定你不能不先问我！

translation.en: I'mma ask the woman in if that's all right with you.
translation.zh: 我要去请那女人进来 如果你没意见的话

translation.en: and… beauty of Lena, soul of Billie, the--
translation.zh: 莱娜的美丽、比莉的灵魂 还有…

translation.en: Yes, she does. You taught her well.
translation.zh: 没错 她是有 你把她教得很好

translation.en: The torch has to be passed to someone,
translation.zh: 这火炬早晚是要传给谁的

translation.en: and I believe that someone is your daughter.
translation.zh: 而我相信这个谁就是你的女儿

translation.en: That's the same thing she said to me ten years ago.
translation.zh: 这话跟她十年前跟我说的一模一样

translation.en: And I was telling the truth.
It's just that I think you were ahead of your time.
translation.zh: 只是我觉得你太超前了

translation.en: No. Beauty is right on schedule.
translation.zh: 不 美丽正赶上时候

translation.en: A blind man could tell you she's going places.
translation.zh: 瞎子也能告诉你 她将来肯定大有作为

translation.en: It takes somebody who knows what to do…
I can shape that to make something out of that…
translation.zh: 我塑造她 好好利用她的资质…

translation.en: I can bring people to the table…
translation.zh: 我能找到对的人来帮忙…

translation.en: …so that everyone in America is gonna want a piece of her.
translation.zh: 让全美国上下的每个人都想尝上一口

translation.en: And she can make you a whole lot of money, can't she?
translation.zh: 然后她就能帮你赚到很多钱 对吧？

translation.en: [woman] We can agree to work together on this.
translation.zh: 如果我们能同意共同合作的话…

translation.en: I can promise you you're never gonna have to work again for the rest of your life.
translation.zh: 我敢向你们保证 你们下半辈子就再也不用工作了…

translation.en: [Mother] And if everybody gets a piece,
translation.zh: 要是每个人都尝上一口的话…
-这关乎美丽的将来啊 -我明白

translation.en: And I want what's best for her.
translation.zh: 我想做对她最有利的事

translation.en: You want what's best for your bank account.
translation.zh: 你想做对你银行账户最有利的事

translation.en: Don't make me smack you in front of this white woman.
translation.zh: 别逼我当着这个白种女人的面抽你
我要怎么做才能让你明白

translation.en: to make you know that I have Beauty's best interests at heart?
translation.zh: 我要怎么做才能让你明白 我是真心在为美丽着想？

translation.en: You don't know what's out there.
translation.zh: 你根本不懂外头是什么世道

translation.en: The… the record industry is the devil,
and he's just waiting to swallow you up.
translation.zh: 他就在那等着 要把你吞噬掉呢

translation.en: [Mother] Do you know what they do to stars, huh?
translation.zh: 你知道他们是怎么对明星的吗？嗯？

translation.en: They build you up just so they can tear you down.
translation.zh: 他们把你捧上天 就是为了毁掉你

translation.en: Can't nobody tear me down, Mommy.
translation.zh: 没人能毁掉我的 妈妈

translation.en: You taught me to keep my head high
Go to your room or be dragged.
translation.zh: 到你的房间去 不然我把你拖回去

translation.en: I am not sending her out in the world to be eaten by wolves.
translation.zh: 我绝不会把她到外头去 害她被狼吃掉的

translation.en: [Father] How you know that she not a wolf?
translation.zh: 你又怎么知道 她不是一匹狼的？

translation.en: 'Cause she came out of my body.
translation.zh: 因为她是我身上掉下来的肉
好嘞 这样应该就修好了

translation.en: Can you hand me that rag over there?
translation.zh: 能帮我把那块抹布递过来吗？

translation.en: What you doing up so early?
For sure, you got a lot on your mind.
translation.zh: 是啊 你心里肯定很乱

translation.en: Hey, get in the car. Try to turn it on.
translation.zh: 嘿 坐到车里去 试着发动一下

translation.en: [Father] You in the driver seat now.
translation.zh: 你现在就坐在驾驶座上

translation.en: Move over. I'll take it from here.
translation.zh: 让一下 接下来交给我
那么 你想到哪里去？

translation.en: You really think I'm gon' make it?
translation.zh: 你真的认为我会成功吗？

translation.en: I think that you're gonna give people hope.
translation.zh: 我认为啊 你会带给人们你希望

translation.en: God, I can't help but look at you and still see my little girl. [inhales]
translation.zh: 我看着你的时候啊 眼里依旧是我的小宝贝

translation.en: I just wish I could hold on to you a little bit longer.
translation.zh: 多希望我能再多留住你一会儿

translation.en: When you sign that contract, everything's gonna change.
translation.zh: 当你签下了那份合约后 一切都会改变的
看着你在那份合约上签字

translation.en: probably be the hardest thing I ever have to do.
translation.zh: 可能会是我这辈子做的最艰难的事

translation.en: It's not easy for a father… [inhales] …to send his little girl out into the world.
translation.zh: 把自己的宝贝女儿送出去闯世界 对一个父亲来说可不容易

translation.en: Jasmine and I were talking-- She's not your family.
translation.zh: -茉莉跟我讨论了一… -她不是你的家人
如果你不签那个合约的话

translation.en: you're gonna regret it the rest of your life.
translation.zh: 你肯定会后悔一辈子的
你啊 命中注定要成就伟大

translation.en: Well, sometimes greatness skips a generation.
translation.zh: 这个嘛 有时候伟大会跳过一代人

translation.en: Why you let him do that?
You live your life, and I'll live mine.
translation.zh: 你过好自己的生活 我过好我的

translation.en: You really think you can trust him? Of course I can.
translation.zh: -你真认为你可以相信他？ -当然可以了

translation.en: [Jasmine] Just 'cause he's your father doesn't mean he's trustworthy.
translation.zh: 仅仅因为他是你父亲 不代表他就值得信任

translation.en: You gonna sign the contract or not?
translation.zh: 你到底打不打算签合约？

translation.en: Your life's gonna get real big real fast.
translation.zh: 你的人生很快就要发生 翻天覆地的变化

translation.en: It's gonna be like a freight train you can't stop.
translation.zh: 就像一辆你停不下来的列车

translation.en: Yeah, but you'll be on that train with me.
translation.zh: 是的 但不是有你陪着我坐吗

translation.en: What if I want my own train?
translation.zh: 要是我想要自己的火车呢？

translation.en: My train will be a lot nicer.
-I don't got no money. -[bartender] It's on the house.
translation.zh: 我可没有钱哦 我请你

translation.en: How come you never give me no free shit?
translation.zh: 你怎么就从没给过我免费的货呐？

translation.en: Is that your way of giving God praise?
translation.zh: 你就是这样赞美上帝的吗？

translation.en: You are not singing from your gut.
-I'm trying. -Y… y'all hear me do it every Sunday.
translation.zh: 我在努力 你们每个礼拜日都听我唱

translation.en: No, you won't, 'cause I done had enough.
translation.zh: 不 别试了 因为我已经受够了

translation.en: [Mother] You are way too pretty and way too talented
translation.zh: 你实在太过漂亮 太过有才华了

translation.en: to walk out on a national stage and not be noticed.
translation.zh: 你这样走到面向全国的舞台上 是不可能不被人注意到的

translation.en: [Beauty] I just wanna use the gift God gave me.
translation.zh: 我只是想要利用好上帝赐予我的礼物

translation.en: [Beauty] People can fantasize about me all they want.
translation.zh: 别人要怎么幻想我 就随他们去好了

translation.en: [Mother] It's way too much to live up to.
translation.zh: 比天高的期许是不可能达到的

translation.en: I have sung behind people my whole life.
translation.zh: 我这辈子一直躲在别人背后唱歌

translation.en: Never had the spotlight on my face.
translation.zh: 聚光灯从未打到过我的脸上

translation.en: But I've been close enough to see 'em get burned by it.
translation.zh: 可我也足够靠近 看到过太多人被其灼伤了

translation.en: It ain't all it's cracked up to be.
translation.zh: 这一行并不像传说中的那样好

translation.en: It's not about you being careful.
translation.zh: 重点不是你小心不小心

translation.en: It's about you having to be something you not.
translation.zh: 重点是你会被迫做不了自己

translation.en: [scoffs] You can't spend the rest of your life trying to be something else.
translation.zh: 你是没办法一辈子假装成别人的

translation.en: You will end up forgetting who you really are.
translation.zh: 到头来你会连真正的自己是谁都忘掉
这种事不会发生在我身上

translation.en: You think I don't know who you are?
translation.zh: 你以为我不知道你是谁吗？
做母亲的 肯定了解自己孩子

translation.en: Folk gon' wanna know who you laying with, Beauty.
translation.zh: 别人肯定会想知道 你在跟谁睡的 美丽

translation.en: -And that's none of their business. -And that ain't how none of this work.
translation.zh: 这不关他们的事 做这行完全不是那么回事

translation.en: Just 'cause it didn't work out for you doesn't mean it won't work out for me.
translation.zh: 仅仅因为你最后没能成功 不代表我就不会成功

translation.en: You are sheltered, and you're spoiled.
translation.zh: 一直有人替你挡着 你都被宠坏了

translation.en: We have spent our whole lives trying to protect you.
translation.zh: 我们这辈子一直都在努力地保护你

translation.en: When you walk out on that stage, we can't come with you.
translation.zh: 当你走上那个舞台时 我们可没办法跟你一起

translation.en: So who gonna do it, then?
The world ain't ready for that.
translation.zh: 这世界还没准备好接受这件事
我们是朋友 仅此而已

translation.en: -I don't sleep in a bed with my friends. -That's because God's your only friend.
translation.zh: -我可不会跟我的朋友同床共枕 -那是因为你只有上帝一个朋友

translation.en: Life, life is about balance, Beauty.
translation.zh: 人生啊 人生是有平衡的 美丽

translation.en: For every good thing you get,
something bad… something bad is gonna happen.
translation.zh: 就一定会有…一定有坏事会发生

translation.en: It's okay if I'm not with you on that train.
translation.zh: 我不陪你坐那列车也没关系的

translation.en: Can't always get everything you want.
translation.zh: 不可能事事都称心如意的

translation.en: 'Cause that's not how the world works.
translation.zh: 因为这世界就不是那样的

translation.en: You don't think I should sign that contract, do you?
translation.zh: 你认为我不该签那份合约 对吧？

translation.en: I don't think your father's the only one that should be looking at it.
translation.zh: 我认为你不该只让你爸看合约

translation.en: -Find a lawyer. -I don't know how to do that.
translation.zh: -去找个律师 -我不知道该怎么找

translation.en: I'll always be here to protect you.
translation.zh: 我会永远在你身边保护你的

translation.en: I woke up this morning. I had no doubts.
translation.zh: 我今天早上起来 心中没有半点疑虑

translation.en: How many of y'all had doubts?
translation.zh: 你们中有多少人还有疑虑的？

translation.en: Well, we gonna clear that up right now.
translation.zh: 我们现在就把它们都清除掉

translation.en: All right now. How you doing, sister?
translation.zh: 好嘞 你好吗 姊妹？

translation.en: [pastor] Give it up for this beautiful choir, y'all!
translation.zh: 请大家为我们动听的唱诗班鼓掌吧！
上帝真是太好了 对吧？

translation.en: Stand up if you love Him. Stand up if you love Him!
translation.zh: 如果你们爱他就站起来 如果你们爱他就站起来！

translation.en: [pastor] All right, y'all. I have no doubts.
translation.zh: 好嘞 大家伙儿 我心中毫无疑虑

translation.en: [pastor] Hey, help me remember ya right here.
translation.zh: 嘿 帮帮我记住你们 为耶稣呼喊 为耶稣举起你们的手来

translation.en: Shout for Jesus. Raise your hands for Jesus.
translation.zh: 为耶稣呼喊 为耶稣举起你们的手来

translation.en: I see some smiles in here.

translation.zh: 手！对了！ 对了 姊妹

translation.en: You got the pearls on today.
[Mother] We're all excited until the bottom drops out, right?
translation.zh: 戛然而止前 每个人都很兴奋 对吧？

translation.en: We all waiting here. She's gonna just take that pen
translation.zh: -是啊 -她说 我们都在等… 她就只需要拿起那支笔 然后在第三页上签个名
她就只需要拿起那支笔 然后在第三页上签个名
美丽 你要怎么做呀？

translation.en: I want my lawyer to look at it.
translation.zh: 我想让我的律师看一看

translation.en: Your dad and I have looked that contract over a million times.
translation.zh: 那份合约呀 你爸跟我都已经看了 不下一百万遍了吧

translation.en: Now my lawyer could go over it again.
translation.zh: 现在我的律师可以再看一遍了

translation.en: What you need with a lawyer?
Jasmine thought I should get one.
translation.zh: 茉莉觉得我应该请一个

translation.en: What you doing? Come over here. Get up. Come on, now. Right now!
translation.zh: 你干什么？给我过来 起来 走 快来 立刻！

translation.en: What the hell you think you're doing?
I'm just looking out for myself.
translation.zh: 我只是想保护自己罢了

translation.en: That's what this is about for you.
And I wanna make sure I have a say in it.
-You know she has a name. -I don't give a shit what her name is.
translation.zh: -你知道吗 她是有名字的 -我才不在乎她叫什么名字

translation.en: I am your father, and you're not gonna disrespect me.
translation.zh: 我是你的父亲 你不许对我不敬

translation.en: I'm not trying to disrespect you.
I wanna make sure I'm doing the right thing.
translation.zh: 我只是想确保我在做正确的事

translation.en: If you don't sign that contract now,
translation.zh: 如果你不现在就把那份合约签了

translation.en: I'mma put your shit on the front lawn, and you can fend for yourself.
translation.zh: 我就把你的破东西全丢到前院去 从此你可以自生自灭

translation.en: After all I done for you, this is how you repay me?
translation.zh: 在我为你做了这么多事后 你就这样报答我？

translation.en: I never thought I'd see the day when my own daughter thinks I'm trying to steal from her.
translation.zh: 我从没想过自己的女儿会认为 我是在想方设法偷她的钱
爸爸 我不知这么认为的

translation.en: Well, you better figure it out, honey.
translation.zh: 你最好自己想清楚 亲爱的

translation.en: You better make a decision fast
because we worked too hard to get here for you to throw it all away.
translation.zh: 因为我们付出了太多才走到今天 不能就这样被你全丢掉

translation.en: Okay, gonna be a big star.
translation.zh: 好嘞 要成为大明星了哟

translation.en: -[woman] We did it. -[Father] I think we did it together.
translation.zh: -我们成功了 -我觉得这是我们共同努力的结果

translation.en: And I'm gonna be there for you every step of the way.
translation.zh: 这一路上的每一步 我都会陪在你身边的

translation.en: Are you really happy for me, Mommy?
translation.zh: 你真为我感到开心吗 妈妈？

translation.en: Why your face lookin' so long?
What you mean you can't find her?
I called her house three times, and no one answered.
translation.zh: 我给她家打了三通电话 没人接

translation.en: And then I went over there, and her mom said she wasn't home.
translation.zh: 于是我就跑了过去 她妈说她不在家

translation.en: Okay, well, I'm sure she's fine. She'll turn up.
translation.zh: 好吧 我相信她肯定没事 她会来找你的

translation.en: Why don't you come downstairs with us and have a drink?
translation.zh: 不如你到楼下来 跟我们一起喝上一杯吧？

translation.en: Your brothers is already down there drunk.
translation.zh: 你那俩兄弟已经喝醉了

translation.en: what kind of man you are.
translation.zh: 你到底是个怎样的男人？

translation.en: I could tell you what kind of man Abe won't be.
translation.zh: 我能告诉你亚伯会成为怎样的男人

translation.en: [Father] Yeah, he living the life right now.
translation.zh: 别看他现在过得春风得意

translation.en: 'Cause he got my good looks and his mother's charm.
translation.zh: 因为他遗传了我的英俊 和他母亲的魅力
因为一切都是别人端着送到他手上的

translation.en: That's why he always walk around with that stupid look on his face.
translation.zh: 所以他才整天 挂着那副愚蠢的表情四处招摇

translation.en: now 'cause as he gets older, his looks will fade,
translation.zh: 珍惜现在 因为啊 随着他的老去 他的外貌会褪去

translation.en: as will his ability to talk women out their panties.
translation.zh: 他用花言巧语 骗女人上床的能力也会

translation.en: And he would be sad and miserable.
translation.zh: 然后他就会充满悲伤与痛苦

translation.en: and his children will only love him
translation.zh: 而他的孩子们之所以还爱他
仅仅因为他是他们的父亲
没有人会记得他的名字

translation.en: will feel compelled to keep his memory alive.
translation.zh: 也不会觉得有必要他的记忆延续下去

translation.en: 'Cause I wasn't there when you conceived.
translation.zh: 因为怀你的时候我不在场

translation.en: -But you was there when I was born. -Yeah. Not the same.
translation.zh: -可我出生的时候你在场啊 -嗯 不一样的

translation.en: I'm still trying to figure you out.
[Cain] Well, what you need to know?
if you'd do something for me.
translation.zh: 你是否愿意帮我做件事

translation.en: I'd do anything for you, Pop.
translation.zh: 我愿意为你做任何事 老爸

translation.en: [Cain] What you need me to do?
The fuck you mean "make her go away"?
translation.zh: 什么他妈的叫“让她离开”啊？

translation.en: Show me what kind of man you are.
translation.zh: 让我看看你是个怎样的男人

translation.en: [Cain] Me and Abe just 'bout to go for a ride.
translation.zh: 我跟亚伯一起去兜个风而已

translation.en: Get your ass in the fucking car.
-I'll tell you when we get there. -Fuck that. Tell me now.
translation.zh: -到了我再告诉你 -滚 现在就告诉我

translation.en: -Just relax. -Nigga, don't tell me to relax.
translation.zh: -放轻松 -小子 别叫我放松

translation.en: I ain't got nothing against Jasmine.
translation.zh: 我觉得茉莉没什么不好的

translation.en: If Beauty want a lady friend, that's her business. It ain't got nothing to do with us.
translation.zh: 如果美丽想要找一个女朋友 那是她的事 跟我们一点关系都没有

translation.en: -It's got everything to do with us. -It's her life.
translation.zh: -这跟我们关系大了 -这是她的人生

translation.en: We can't have evil people hanging around our sister.
translation.zh: 我们可不能让邪恶之人 整天在我们姐妹的身边转
我们应该要保护她才对
你还没成熟 你不懂
你向来都是一副没长大的样子

translation.en: You need to man the fuck up!
translation.zh: 你要表现得像他妈男人一点！

translation.en: -Get your ass out! -You really wanna fuckin' fight me?
translation.zh: -给我滚出来！ -你真他妈想跟我打？

translation.en: Come out before I drag your ass out.
translation.zh: 出来 别逼我把你拖出来

translation.en: What? Try and hit me again!
Come here! You run like a girl, motherfucker!
translation.zh: 过来！跑起来像个女的一样 你个混账！
你什么意思啊 哥们？

translation.en: I don't think I've seen you in here without her.
translation.zh: 我好像都没见过你不跟她在一起

translation.en: Yeah, well, I… I can be alone sometimes.
translation.zh: 这个嘛 我偶尔也会一个人的

translation.en: You know, I got some shit if you want it.
translation.zh: 我这儿有些货 如果你想要的话

translation.en: Yeah, that's not really my thing. It's Beauty's.
translation.zh: 我不是很喜欢这玩意 美丽喜欢

translation.en: Well, maybe you could gift it to her.
translation.zh: 那你可以买给她作礼物呀

translation.en: [Jasmine] Come on, my dude. That ain't no gift.
translation.zh: 拜托 大哥 这算什么礼物啊

translation.en: It would be if you gave it to her.
-[Jasmine] Meet you where? -Out back. Come on.
translation.zh: 到哪里去找你？ 后头 来吧

translation.en: [bartender] Yeah… Right over here. I got you.
I told you I got you. Come on.
translation.zh: 我都说我有货了 快来吧

translation.en: You ain't got nothing to say to me, boy?
translation.zh: 你没什么话要跟我说吗 小子？

translation.en: You, who are just like me?
You couldn't do that shit, boy.
translation.zh: 你根本就干不了 小子

translation.en: Just like everything else I ask you to do.
translation.zh: 我要你做的其他事也一样

translation.en: [Beauty] We just gotta get out of here.
translation.zh: 我们只要离开这里就没事了
我们不能一直这样下去
你更我 随便叫什么

translation.en: You live your life, I'll live mine.
translation.zh: 你过你的生活 我过我的

translation.en: Why didn't you say it back?
♪ I'm in love, love, love, yeah ♪
[Beauty] We finally have a place of our own.
translation.zh: 我们终于有个属于自己的地方了

translation.en: What do you say to the criticism you've been getting from your Black audience?
translation.zh: 你对来自黑人听众的批评 有什么要回应的？

translation.en: Well, some people say that you're pandering to a white audience
translation.zh: 是这样的 有人说你是在讨好白人听众

translation.en: and that you don't want your music to sound too
translation.zh: 说你不想让自己的音乐太有…

translation.en: -[woman whispers] Stay in character. -No, I'm asking you a question.
translation.zh: -别出戏 -不 我在问你问题呢

translation.en: No, we… we are gonna first appeal to the urban audience.
translation.zh: 不 我们一开始要先吸引市内的听众
你说“一开始”是什么意思？

translation.en: [woman] Well, we're gonna choose a song
translation.zh: 是这样的 我们要先选一首

translation.en: that Black women are going to love.
Also, that white teenage girls are gonna go crazy over
translation.zh: 同时呢 青春期的白人女孩 会疯狂地喜欢上

translation.en: and play over and over and over again.
translation.zh: 她们会一遍又一遍地反复听

translation.en: That way, you'll get both sides of the market.
translation.zh: 这样一来 你就得到了两边的市场
你啊 就会成为偶像

translation.en: Now, I'd like you to answer the question that I ask you,
translation.zh: 好了 我想要你来回答一下 我刚才问你的问题

translation.en: and I'd like you to do it in proper English.
translation.zh: 而且我想要你用正式的英语来回答

translation.en: I… I don't know how to sing in Black, white…
translation.zh: 我不懂怎样唱是黑人、白人…

translation.en: I just know how to sing, because that's what I like to do.
translation.zh: 我只懂怎么唱歌 因为这才是我喜欢的

translation.en: You have a lot of love songs on your album.
translation.zh: 你的专辑里有很多情歌
当你在唱那些歌的时候

translation.en: who are you singing them to?
Let's just go with the answer we prepared.
translation.zh: 还是按照我们准备好的答案来吧

translation.en: Why do I have to do this?
Because you cannot just be a singing star.
translation.zh: 因为你不能只做一个歌星而已

translation.en: You, Beauty, have to be the whole package.
translation.zh: 美丽啊 你必须要成为一个 各方面都完美的偶像

translation.en: There are a lot of little… little girls
translation.zh: 有很多小女孩 很小很小的女孩

translation.en: who need someone to look up to.
translation.zh: 需要一个可以崇拜的人

translation.en: If you wanna be a star…
you're gonna have to wear a mask.
Let's answer the question as it was prepared.
translation.zh: 我们按照准备好的来回答问题

translation.en: I haven't found that special someone yet.
translation.zh: 我还没有找到那个特别的人

translation.en: But when I'm singing those love songs,
translation.zh: 不过当我在唱那些情歌的时候

translation.en: I'm thinking about what he could be.
translation.zh: 我会想象那个男人… 是什么样的
你看起来很美 宝贝

translation.en: Um, please don't say that in public.
translation.zh: 请别在公开场合下说这种话

translation.en: Just wait for when we're at the house, okay?
translation.zh: 等我们回到家里再说 好吗？

translation.en: This is all still a lot for us to get used to.
translation.zh: 我们还有好多东西要适应

translation.en: I don't care what you do at home.
translation.zh: 我不在乎你们在家里做什么

translation.en: Just when we're out and about, we have a certain image to maintain.
translation.zh: 只不过 当我们在外头的时候 我们必须维持某种特定的形象

translation.en: I just want what's best for you.
translation.zh: 我只想做对你最有利的事

translation.en: I know what's best for me.
translation.zh: 我知道什么对我最有利

translation.en: Why don't you try on one of the long, black, flowing ones?
translation.zh: 不如你试试那种黑色的飘飘长发吧？

translation.en: Why can't I just rock my own hair?
translation.zh: 我为什么不能以自己的头发亮相啊？

translation.en: [woman] Because research says that little Black girls like long, flowing hair.
translation.zh: 因为研究表明 黑人小女孩喜欢飘飘的长发

translation.en: Maybe that's because people like you
translation.zh: 或许那是因为像你这样的人

translation.en: always tell them that's the only way they can be beautiful.
translation.zh: 总告诉她们说 只有这样她们才是美丽的

translation.en: You sure you don't wanna try a long one?
translation.zh: 你确定你不想试试长的吗？

translation.en: No. Actually, I like the short, curly one.
translation.zh: 不 我还是喜欢卷卷的短发

translation.en: [Jasmine] Yeah, I like that one too.
translation.zh: 嗯 我也喜欢那样的

translation.en: [woman] Max, slap that one on there, and let's take a look at it first.
translation.zh: 不过啊 麦克斯 要不你先把这个套上 我们先看一下

translation.en: Ooh, ah, ah, ah, let's go.
Turn and dip and move that hip. Okay!
translation.zh: 先转再摆 屁股动起来 好嘞

translation.en: One more time. Let's go. And…
translation.zh: 再跳一次 加油 预备…
哦 好吧 你猜怎么着？

translation.en: I never met a Black person who couldn't dance before.
translation.zh: 我还从来没见过不会跳舞的黑人呢
每个流行歌星都得会跳舞

translation.en: She ain't every pop star. Just keep the steps simple.
translation.zh: 她不是普通的流行歌星 把舞步排得简单些

translation.en: She can join up for some of those, and then the complicated stuff,
translation.zh: 她可以跳上那么一两段 然后到了复杂的部分

translation.en: she can be out front doing one of her long runs.
translation.zh: 她可以站到前面去 来段长的那种
她同意就行 我没问题

translation.en: Trust me, she hates this shit.
translation.zh: 相信我 她最讨厌这玩意了

translation.en: [man] I'm sorry. It's just an expression.
translation.zh: 对不起嘛 这不过是一种形容罢了

translation.en: I don't give a fuck what it is. Don't be calling my girl no horse.
translation.zh: 我他妈才不管这是什么 别说我的妹子是马

translation.en: Do we have the words to give you? Can we do that on the stand?
translation.zh: 我们要把歌词给你吗 可以把它放在架子上吗？

translation.en: [woman] So you're not looking at it, but is there a way…
translation.zh: 因为你没在看 我们有没有什么办法能…

translation.en: I need some amazing vocalists behind her.
translation.zh: 我需要找些非常厉害的歌手给她伴唱

translation.en: Who do you have in mind?
[neighbor] Hey, um, can you turn it down, please?
translation.zh: 嘿 那个 能请你关小一点吗？

translation.en: I've been living here two whole years. Been quiet as shit.
translation.zh: 听着 我在这里已经住了整整两年 一直都安静得不得了

translation.en: Teenagers move in, and I haven't had a peaceful night since.
translation.zh: 青少年搬进来之后 我就再也没有过一夜安宁

translation.en: You motherfuckers always playing music loud, giggling and shit.
translation.zh: 你们这帮混蛋啊 总是大声放音乐 还咯咯大笑什么的

translation.en: Well, you sure do look like one.
That's because you haven't seen me with my clothes off.
translation.zh: 那是因为你没看到过 我没穿衣服的样子

translation.en: Listen, just, uh… just try to keep it down, okay?
translation.zh: 听着 尽量别太大声就行 好吗？

translation.en: You were talking to him a long time.
Relax, he just wanted me to turn the music down.
translation.zh: 放轻松啦 他只是想让我把音乐关小一点

translation.en: I'm surprised you didn't cuss his ass out.
translation.zh: 我很惊讶你没把他骂出去

translation.en: I wasn't in the mood to cuss his ass out.
You always in the mood to cuss somebody out.
translation.zh: 把人骂出去这种事 你随时都有心情的

translation.en: [woman] So you ready for your big debut?
translation.zh: 你准备好要初次亮相了吗？

translation.en: [woman] Irv wants you to come on his show and sing.
translation.zh: 欧文想让你上他的节目去唱歌

translation.en: So you're going on his show, and you're gonna sing.
translation.zh: 就是他的节目上做嘉宾 你要唱首歌

translation.en: [Beauty] The album ain't even done yet.
translation.zh: 可专辑啥的都还没录好呢
那我们该唱什么单曲呢？

translation.en: [woman] Nobody wants you to go on The Irv Merlin Show
translation.zh: 没人会希望看到你上 《欧文·梅林秀》

translation.en: and sing a song they've never heard of.
translation.zh: 唱一首他们从没听过的歌

translation.en: [Beauty] I don't wanna go on TV singing someone else's song.
translation.zh: 我可不想上电视唱别人的歌

translation.en: I wanna sing my own music.
[woman] Nobody's gonna care what you're singing.
translation.zh: 没人会在乎你在唱什么

translation.en: What they care about is that you are a young, beautiful woman
translation.zh: 他们在乎的是 你是个年轻貌美的女人

translation.en: with a voice of an angel.
That song is wholesome, and Irv's audience knows that.
translation.zh: 那首歌很健康 欧文的观众也熟知

translation.en: You mean white people know it.
Well, why don't you take this?
translation.zh: 这样 要不你把这个拿去

translation.en: See if you can learn something.
translation.zh: 看看你能不能学到些什么

translation.en: Take these and see what a couple of my big stars did with their opportunity.
translation.zh: 还有这些 看看我的几个大明星 是如何利用他们的机会的

translation.en: I have a conference call in five.
translation.zh: 我五分钟后有个电话会议

translation.en: Kelly, get me Stevie on the phone.
translation.zh: 凯莉 把史提夫的电话接通

translation.en: [Beauty] Are you gonna come in with me?
How come Mommy didn't call me?
translation.zh: 妈妈怎么没给我打电话？

translation.en: He's at Saint Michael's on the fifth floor.
translation.zh: 他在圣米迦勒医院五楼

translation.en: I'm sorry I didn't come earlier to visit you. I…
translation.zh: 很抱歉我没有早点来看你 我…

translation.en: I didn't know you were sick.
They said they have to open me up,
translation.zh: 他们说必须得给我动手术

translation.en: Not getting enough blood or something.

translation.zh: 那是因为吃了太多猪肉

translation.en: But I'm young. I can do all that.
translation.zh: 可我还年轻啊 我有这个资本

translation.en: -If I don't make it outta here-- -Don't… don't say that.
translation.zh: -如果我不能活着从这里出去… -别这么说

translation.en: Let me speak my piece, okay?
translation.zh: 让我先把话说完 好吗？

translation.en: I've always been an ambitious man.
translation.zh: 我向来都是一个很有野心的男人

translation.en: I got that from my father.
I think that's why I was so determined to make something of myself.
translation.zh: 我觉得就是因为这样 我才下定决心要做个大人物

translation.en: I wanted my life to have meaning.
translation.zh: 我想要让自己的人生有点意义
我意识到 我也就只有能力做个一家之主罢了

translation.en: for just being the head of my house.
translation.zh: 我也就只有能力做个一家之主罢了

translation.en: I wasn't even good at that.
That's why it was so important
to me that you make it.
translation.zh: 对我来说才如此的重要

translation.en: I thought, if you went far,
translation.zh: 我以为 如果你可以走得很远

translation.en: [Father] That's why it's hard for me to say this…
translation.zh: 所以我才很难把这话说出口…

translation.en: but I need you to give me my cut.
translation.zh: 但我需要你也给我一份

translation.en: [Father] I'm the one negotiated that contract for you. You know what? I'm not doing this.
translation.zh: -是我帮你谈好的合约 -我不想谈这个

translation.en: [Father] I know you got a new apartment downtown.
translation.zh: 我知道你在市中心买了套新公寓

translation.en: I even heard you bought your little girlfriend a car.
translation.zh: 我甚至还听说 你给你的小女朋友买了辆车

translation.en: Yeah, and where'd you hear that?
translation.zh: 是啊 你从哪里听来的？

translation.en: You can't keep nothing from me.
translation.zh: 你什么事都瞒不了我的

translation.en: Is that why you wanted to see me?
translation.zh: 你想见我就是要说这个？

translation.en: [Father] All I need is for you to pay me what you owe.
translation.zh: 我只不过是需要你 把你欠我的付给我

translation.en: You owe me your whole life.
translation.zh: 你的整条命都是欠我的

translation.en: [chuckles] I didn't think the business was gonna change you,
translation.zh: 我没想到做这行会改变你

translation.en: but you up in here acting all crazy, and you ain't even had a hit record yet.
translation.zh: 可你连一张热卖的专辑都还没有 就已经这样不可一世了
但有一天 我会有的

translation.en: I'mma have a whole bunch of 'em.
And while I'm celebrating, drinking champagne,
translation.zh: 而当我在狂欢庆祝 喝着香槟的时候

translation.en: Those the last words you wanna say to your father?
translation.zh: 这就是你想对自己父亲 说的最后一句话？

translation.en: Is that how you want me to remember you?
translation.zh: 这就是你想让我记住的样子？

translation.en: [Irv] How would you describe the young lady who's about to come out here?
translation.zh: 你会如何描述 即将出场的这位年轻女士？

translation.en: Well, I would say she's magical.
[woman] Thank you. And I think she's strong and confident.
translation.zh: 谢谢 我觉得她很坚强 很自信
她的名字的确挺符合的

translation.en: It's true. She has a beautiful complexion.
translation.zh: 没错 她的肤色非常美

translation.en: You ready? Of course I am.

translation.zh: 你很自信 这点很好

translation.en: Your father would be so proud.
translation.zh: 你父亲在天有灵肯定会很骄傲的

translation.en: Jas, can you put that thing away?
translation.zh: 小茉 你能把那玩意放下吗？

translation.en: This is a big deal. I wanna capture the moment.
translation.zh: 这是个大事件 我想要记录下这一刻

translation.en: Wha-- You hear how slow they playing?
translation.zh: 你听到他们弹得有多慢了吗？

translation.en: If they play like that, you'll put everybody to sleep.
translation.zh: 要是他们这样弹的话 你会把大家都唱睡着的

translation.en: I'mma go tell them to speed it up.
translation.zh: 我这就去叫他们弹快点

translation.en: Ma, they the house band. I think they know what they doing.
translation.zh: 妈 他们是常驻乐队 我觉得他们知道自己在做什么

translation.en: They're used to playing for little white girls.
translation.zh: 他们习惯了给白人姑娘伴奏

translation.en: But if it wasn't for her, I wouldn't be here.
translation.zh: 可要不是因为她 我也不会有今天

translation.en: [neighbor] Listen, I ain't got all day now.
translation.zh: 听着 我可没有一整天的时间

translation.en: Yo, who the fuck is that?
It's the boy from the other apartment, the one complaining about the music.
translation.zh: 就是另一件公寓里的那个男孩 抱怨音乐太响的那个

translation.en: Not yet, but I will be.
translation.zh: 还没有 不过很快就会了

translation.en: Yeah? What makes you so sure?
that no one can sing better than me.
Can't nobody sing better than her.
Well, we just gonna have to see about that, ain't we?
translation.zh: 这我们只有走着瞧了 不是吗？

translation.en: Well, um, I just wanted to come back here, uh, wish you good luck, give you those.
translation.zh: 我只是想到后头来 祝你好运 把那个送给你

translation.en: I just wanted him to come and hear me sing.
translation.zh: 我只是想让他来听我唱歌

translation.en: 'Cause I told him I was a good singer, and he didn't believe me.
translation.zh: 因为我跟他说了我是个好歌手 可他却不相信

translation.en: Is that the only reason you invited him?
translation.zh: 这是你邀请他的唯一理由吗？

translation.en: the only person I wanna hear applauding is you.
translation.zh: 我唯一想听到的掌声 是你的

translation.en: I would applaud for you even if you fall flat on your face.
translation.zh: 就算你表现得一塌糊涂 我也会为你鼓掌的

translation.en: …and she has this aura about her that's magnetic.
translation.zh: 她身上有这么一种气场 充满了吸引力

translation.en: [Irv] Yes. I was drawn to her right away when I saw her perform the other night.
translation.zh: 是的 那天晚上看到她表演时 我立刻就被她吸引住了

translation.en: [woman] Mm-hmm. I don't think I've ever met someone quite like her.
translation.zh: 我从没遇到过她这样的人

translation.en: that kind of girl that only comes along once in a lifetime.
translation.zh: 那种你一辈子只见过一面的女孩
就好像…如果我能这么说的话

translation.en: it's like God was showing off a little bit when He made her.
translation.zh: 上帝在创造她的时候 简直就是在炫耀

translation.en: -[Irv] Sure. -That He breathed it on her vocal cords…
translation.zh: -可以啊 -他在她的声带上吹了口气…

translation.en: smiled when He made her spirit
translation.zh: 雕刻她灵魂的时候 他面带微笑

translation.en: and laughed when He finished that face.
translation.zh: 完成她脸庞的时候 他放声大笑

translation.en: [woman] Yeah. I think, uh, she made… He made something truly special.
translation.zh: 是啊 我觉得他创造了一件 极其特别的东西

translation.en: Yeah, I… I just think that she's gonna change all of our lives.
translation.zh: 是啊 我觉得她将改变 我们所有人的生命
女士们先生们 美丽
